Take Out Delivery Area: North to 135th West to Cicero East to State South to 75th User Reviews
See Thru Chinese Kitchen Posted by Mzshines on 06/28/2011
Crispy chicken
Great food and service See Thru Chinese Kitchen Posted by Michael on 07/07/2010
Quality food at a decent price
This restaurant have really good food at a decent price. But, I would not plan any dates there. The atmosphere is more like a fast food restaurant and is very deceiving if you use the look and feel of a restaurant to determine rather or not to dine there. I will recommend take out or delivery because the food is very good and the service is nice beside the fact that they make you pay for chop sticks. See Thru Chinese Kitchen Posted by ENGINEER on 03/31/2010
The Bomb
Chinese food so good make you wanna smack yo mama! See Thru Chinese Kitchen Posted by Marsha on 08/20/2007
Great Food
This chinese place has the best food on the Southside of Chicago
1
